unnormalised: Forget rote learning, folks! Adaptive learning platforms are making waves in Indian education. Think personalized learning, but on steroids!

unnormalised: Take, for example, Vidya Valley School in Pune. They’re seeing amazing results after implementing an adaptive learning system for Maths. Apparently, kids are understanding concepts faster and scoring higher on tests – no more dreaded Maths phobia!
